title: simple heavy black
content:
Hello again, this time I need to figure out  
what this Impact-like font is. Thanks a bunch!

 [‹ (x) 3 mobile UK sans serif - Modena (custom face by Miles Newlyn) {Sebastian, Stephen}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924064815/http:/typophile.com/node/45548 "Go to previous forum topic") [Help with these handwritten fonts ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924064815/http:/typophile.com/node/45627 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Plan B

comments.content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924064815im_/http:/typophile.com/files/construct_5845.jpg)

...I should really stop using Paint to format...

[Berthold Akzidenz-Grotesk Extra Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924064815/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/akzidenz-grotesk-be/extra-bold/) is a good match.

Are you related to one ’Plan 9’ from Outer Space?
